#: by Elliotte Harold's words the mind was *winged* :#
> I'm fact checking for an article I'm writing.
> 
> I vaguely recall that when Beck and Gamma invented JUnit on that famous 
> transatlantic trip, they were inspired by some preexisting framework in 
> SmallTalk. Is that accurate? Does anyone remember what that precursor to 
> JUnit was?
> 

SUnit and it is true it was Smalltalk. (at leats afair)

:alex |.::the_mindstorm::.|
